text: Ne slyshal li ty o tom, kotoryy, sporya s Avraamom o Gospode yego, otritsal, chto bog dal yemu tsarstvo? Kogda Avraam skazal: "Gospod' moy tot kotoryy ozhivlyayet i umershchvlyayet"; togda tot skazal: "YA ozhivlyayu i umershchvlyayu". Avraam skazal: "Bog velit solntsu voskhodit' s vostoka; ty veli yemu voskhodit' s zapada!" Nevernyy izumilsya. Bog ne rukovodstvuyet lyudey nechestivykh
